snippet.title: Destroy All Humans! 2 - Reprobed: Single Player | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
No piece of pesky human technology is safe from Crypto! Destroy All Humans! 2 – Reprobed is finally coming to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One! The alien invader returns with a license to probe, ready to take on hippies, the KGB, and even gigantic lizards.

Coming June 27, Destroy All Humans! 2 - Reprobed: Single Player includes only the single-player campaign, the Challenge Accepted DLC, as well as the Skin Pack DLC and the skins from Destroy All Humans! (2020).

- Links & Info - 
Website: https://www.destroyallhumansgame.com 
Xbox One: https://thqn.net/dah2sp-xbox
PSN Europe: https://thqn.net/dah2sp-psne
PSN America: https://thqn.net/dah2sp-psna
PSN Japan: https://thqn.net/dah2sp-psnj
Discord: https://discord.gg/destroy 

- Our Socials - 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/THQNordic 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DAH_Crypto 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/destroyallhumansgame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thqnordic 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@thqnordic 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/thqnordic 

#DestroyAllHumans #LicencedToProbe
